question: Who won the men’s singles title at Fuzhou China Open 2019?
explanation: Kento Momota won his 10th title of a remarkable year as Japan\'s world number one defeated Chou Tien-chen to retain his Fuzhou China Open crown. Chen Yufei successfully defended the women\'s title with a gritty victory over Japan\'s Nozomi Okuhara. The Indian pair of Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty settled for bronze as they lost their semi-final match of Fuzhou China Open against Indonesia’s Marcus Fernaldi Gideon and Kevin Sanjaya.
